controls: Use the mouse to click on different options as they appear.Follow any on-screen prompts during some quick-time events
content.howToPlay: Guide Henry through his bold museum heist. You’re presented with choices on how to proceed. For example, do you want to sneak in quietly or crash through with a disguise? Each option comes with funny outcomes. And let me give you a secret: not all of them are successful! Sometimes you’ll fall flat on your face if you pick the wrong tool or plan, but don’t sweat it. Give it a good laugh and just click “Retry” to go back and try another path because failing is part of the fun here.  You can also collect all the fails if you want a completion challenge. This is a perfect browser game for anyone who likes interactive stories, comedy, and wacky crime adventures.
content.developer: Henry Stickmin: Stealing the Diamond was created by PuffballsUnited and released on July 8, 2011. The Henry Stickmin series is known for its humor, cartoonish style, and silly storytelling. Although the game was highly popular during its era, it lost some of its popularity due to Adobe discontinuing Flash in 2020. PuffballsUnited later co-founded Innersloth, the studio behind the popular game Among Us. PuffballsUnited also worked on other Henry Stickmin episodes, each with its own unique theme. You can still enjoy Stealing the Diamond for free on OnlineGames.io, supporting indie creators who pour their hearts into their work!​
